page.title: 08HOUSING W.READING
page.content: The area is full of a mixture of new and old buildings.Many of the older houses toward the centre of the town are made of local bricks from the kilns in Water and Elgar Rd.There is terraced property towards the centre of the town;built in the distinct red brick with white patterning in the top half of the house.This feature has also been used in the new houses which have been built near the Inner Distribution road. The farther one travels from the town centre,the houses are both owner occupied and council with large gardens.There are many flats in the Southcote area to the south.The housing estates towards the edge of the area date from 1950 onwards.The area of Tilehurst to the west has been built up around an old village.
